item.title: @elonmusk: If you missed this critical Stephen Miller segment, watch it now. He exposed Democrats are intention...
item.description: If you missed this critical Stephen Miller segment, watch it now. He exposed Democrats are intentionally driving the ‚ÄúSomalification of America‚Äù to cement permanent political power: ‚ÄúWhat is their objective? The Somalification of America. It‚Äôd easier to rule over an empire of ashes than it is for the Democratic party to rule over a functioning, Western, high trust society.‚Äù "Look how powerful the Democrat Party became in Minnesota once they flooded it with 100,000 Somalians.‚Äù "Once the elections were decided by clan rivalries and ethnic feuds, once that happened, the Democrat Party became permanently powerful in Minnesota. They became permanently powerful in the Twin Cities. That‚Äôs their model for America.‚Äù

item.title: @elonmusk: Cathie Wood on Tesla and SpaceX: "This will be considered as the year of the RoboTaxi. We're also le...
item.description: Cathie Wood on Tesla and SpaceX: "This will be considered as the year of the RoboTaxi. We're also learning more about Elon Musk's plans for the moon, for solar powered data centers in Space, and for Mars, and you'll see a lot of what we expect for the next 20 to 25 years in our open source SpaceX model that came out around mid year and caused quite a stir. We also had a great year in terms of space exploration. SpaceX made all kinds of announcements and is delivering service and Starlink throughout the world."
